John Apea bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2008, o ritere Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Screenplay maka ihe nkiri Run Baby Run nke o gosikwara dịka onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri.
Run Baby Run nwetara nhọpụta asatọ ma merie ihe nrite anọ na Africa Movie Academy Awards n'afọ 2008, gụnyere onyinye maka Best Picture, Best Director na Best Screenplay.

Apea gụrụ akwụkwọ na Achimota School na Sociology na Social Policy na Mahadum York nàkwà Mahadum Oxford Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn Ghana a ma ama Home Sweet Home Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi ndị isi oche (CEO) nke eTranzact Ghana, otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ.
